sub-events.comment: Based on heavily modified Sonic Open Construct made by IsraelGames and Oraflame
With added code from: Core Engine Not So Simple Sonic Worlds Halatnikov Full credits in _INFO
Friction when no buttons are pressed
Immediately stop if touched a wall
Accelerate even more in the air
Decelerate when the opposite button is pressed
Decelerate even quicker if opposite button is pressed and skidding minimum is not met
Check if edges collide in the process
If they do, detect an angle
Succesfully land and set speed in consequence
Reset if landing check is interrupted
Immediately stop if touched a ceiling
Immediately fall if floor stops existing
Always call edges sensors to detect the ground really fast
Landing on a slope from colliding a wall
Prevent issues with landing on flat surfaces
Check for floor collision and detect angle
If landing on a slope, set speed in consequence
Fall off slope if you're too slow
Fall if one of the edges stops colliding
Check if position has changed for optimisation purposes
If it did, detect an angle
Call more advanced angle sensors loop, again for optimisation purposes
If edges don't collide, don't change angle
Don't let player escape into the void
Stop moving if speed is ridicoulussly low
Limit height if A isn't pressed anymore
Cancel skidding if opposite button is pressed
Decelerate faster when pressing a button
If player isn't on floor anymore, switch to jumping
